data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yashiro, Toshihisa, Matsuura, Kenji, Guénard, Benoit, Terayama, Mamoru, Dunn, Robert R. (2010): On the evolution of the species complex Pachycondyla chinensis (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Ponerinae), including the origin of its invasive form and description of a new species. Zootaxa 2685: 39-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199426
